item.title: Newcastle beat Tottenham to move into Premier League top four
item.description: Newcastle beat Tottenham to move into Premier League top four Callum Wilson and Miguel Almiron were on target for the Magpies, who have still only lost once this season

item.title: Explained | CCI’s ₹1,300 crore fine on Google and how that will change Android smartphones
item.description: Explained | CCI’s ₹1,300 crore fine on Google and how that will change Android smartphones How is the Alphabet owned company allegedly violating its position especially with regard to the Android mobile device ecosystem?

item.title: 'BJP's Sambit Patra, Iqbal Singh Lalpura violating Central Civil Services rules': AAP
item.description: ‘BJP’s Sambit Patra, Iqbal Singh Lalpura violating Central Civil Services rules’: AAP Patra and Lalpura did not respond immediately to the AAP's demand for their removal.

item.title: Two mediapersons among six arrested for ‘extorting’ ₹1.2 lakh from a businessman in Visakhapatnam
item.description: Two mediapersons among six arrested for ‘extorting’ ₹1.2 lakh from a businessman in Visakhapatnam The city police arrested six persons, including two mediapersons, for allegedly threatening and extorting ₹1.

item.title: Newly married teacher found dead
item.description: Newly married teacher found dead A 25-year-old newly married private school teacher was found dead under mysterious circumstances at her apartment in Puttenahalli on Saturday.

item.title: Jagan to launch third 800-MW unit of supercritical thermal power plant in Andhra Pradesh on October 27
item.description: Jagan to launch third 800-MW unit of supercritical thermal power plant in Andhra Pradesh on October 27 The Chief Minister to also disburse non-fishermen package to the displaced people pending since former Chief Minister Rajasekhara Reddy’s term
